medical_history.chief_complaint: Profuse blood-stained diarrhea and progressive dyspnea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started 2 hours after the patient received unhydrolyzed cow's milk for the first time, initially appearing uncomfortable and passing profuse watery stools every 10-15 minutes, which later became blood-stained after 2 hours.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Global developmental delay secondary to perinatal asphyxia and previous Nissen's fundoplication for gastro-oesophageal reflux disease.
medical_history.social_history: Exclusively fed with hydrolyzed cowâ€™s milk formula via nasogastric tube or gastrostomy since birth; no other dietary habits specified.
